reviews.review_msg: Not a great teacher. Treats students like they are still in High School.  Reasonable exams though.
first midterm was hard, but after u know the format of exams, it'll be better! text book helps a lot, read thru twice/understand everything will def. do good on exams! eventhou its only 50 min!

Maite really knows her stuff, she comes to class well prepared and enthusiastic. However, not  enough examples are given which makes the course very difficult.  Not enough time for midterms (only 50 min) and the marking sceme too high (too many pple @ a 'D'). Ling 200 STRONGLY RECOMMENDED!!
hard to understand; crappy textbook; teach nothing to prepare you for 322; exams are kinda easy
A very good teacher. Approachable and thorough. Frequently asks for feedback on the course and teaching style.
It's not an easy course.  But she teaches well.

She is a great professor!! Her lecture notes are very organize, informative, and helpful. Exams are also very straight forward. If you attend her lecture all the time and read the textbook, this should be an easy course.

you don't have to read the book since she'll do it for you in lectures. studying the lecture notes is good enough. her marking scheme is absolutely horrible and unfair. her exams are extremely tricky and difficult.

You cannot ask this Prof questions; she never gives you a clear answer and often gets defensive. The way she divides marks on a test is terrible and if she tells you not to worry, it's going to be a 'sweet' exam, that only means she's going to bring candy
Why even go to lecture? She just follows the text
